DataElement.preferredName: Feces Output Unit of Measure Stool Output Unit of Measure
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text that describes the unit of measure used to measure stool output.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The material discharged from the bowel during defecation.  It consists of undigested food, intestinal mucus, epithelial cells, and bacteria._Anything coming out of a system._A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The material discharged from the bowel during defecation.  It consists of undigested food, intestinal mucus, epithelial cells, and bacteria.

Concepts.definition: The material discharged from the bowel during defecation.  It consists of undigested food, intestinal mucus, epithelial cells, and bacteria.

Property.preferredDefinition: Anything coming out of a system.:A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

Concepts.definition: Anything coming out of a system.
A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the units of measure for assessment results and dosing.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The standard of measurement for a quantity of stool produced during a given timeframe with differing measurement specifications for children and adults.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Child Milliliter per Kilogram per Day

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Child Milliliter per Kilogram per Day
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who is not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.: Milliliters per kilogram per day or milliliters per day (flow rate), divided by kilograms (weight).

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.
A dose calculation unit expressed in milliliter(s) per kilogram per period of time equal to twenty-four hours.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.: A metric unit of volumetric flow rate defined as the rate at which one milliliter of matter crosses a given surface during the period of time equal to 24 hours.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.
A metric unit of volumetric flow rate defined as the rate at which one milliliter of matter crosses a given surface during the period of time equal to 24 hours.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified used as a standard measurement of same kinds, such as pound or kilogram in measuring weight. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.

ValueDomain.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
